author: Paul Blest, Anne Torpey
title: Italian Mayors Are Losing Their Shit Over People Refusing to Stay Inside
description: “We will send over the police with flamethrowers," said a furious official in the Campania region.
content:
For residents who didnt seem to get the memo to stay inside to stop the coronavirus from ravaging more of Italy, a bunch of Italian mayors and other politicians have resorted to straight-up threats. 
 A video compilation that went viral on Twitter over the w… [+1883 chars]
